video.title: jQuery: add and remove DOM elements - Beau teaches JavaScript
video.description:
Learn how to use jQuery to add and remove DOM elements with append, prepend, after, and before.

💻 Code: https://codepen.io/beaucarnes/pen/zdGMEz

🐦 Beau Carnes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/carnesbeau

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on technology: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

And subscribe for new programming videos every day: https://youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=freecodecamp

topLevelComment.text: Thankhs Beau you have given a really cool easy understandable course ❤️

topLevelComment.text: Nothing big, but since its kind of distracting while watching the video - Jquery is misspelt :P

topLevelComment.author: Ashley Joyce
topLevelComment.text: Thank you for this explanation, I was taking another course and you are my go-to teacher for understanding how to actually understand these DOM elements.
